## FriendlyCaptchaSDKOptions.disableEvalPatching property

Whether to disable the patching of `window.eval`<!-- -->. Useful when the patching breaks your site, which in particular may affect some hot reloading functionality for Webpack (in `dev` mode).

**Signature:**

```typescript
disableEvalPatching?: boolean;
```
